game.name: EG Save Pilot
game.description:
Checking out a brand new adventure challenge will surely help to bring some more happiness and joy to your boring life. Today we have tried to introduce a beautifully-designed adventure game that can keep you entertained for hours. Are you ready to enter a world where no other things except a great proportion of fun and thrill- filled moments exist? Join EG Save Pilot and allow yourself to take you on an exclusive yet surprising adventure. 
Your objective in this free online flying game is to keep the sky free from all your enemy planes. Shoot all them down and eliminate these deadly planes to obtain the points. Do not forget to collect the items on the page to earn extra points. Many deadly rockets also keep chasing you so it is also your responsibility to escape your plane from them to avoid the damage. The speed of the game increases as you progress to make you confused. 
You can also upgrade your airplanes in this highly addictive casual game. Move your airplane around the sky with the mouse click or touch your mobile screen to escape from enemy planes and dangerous rockets. Do not forget to collect the useful items on your way to earn points and finish the game with the highest score. We have a huge collection of free online HTML5 airplane games for boys. Give our other top games a try to learn what makes us the best free online game websites of all. Good luck to play more action games for free.

game.webControlKeys: CLICK ON THE PLANE AND MOVE IT IN YELLOW ARROW DIRECTION ,TRY TO COLLECT THE YELLOW POWER TO INCREACE THE TIME
